_sText:
Ever wanted to have a shoot out in a western setting ?
well here you go!
***with ambient sound for optimal atmosphere!***

Walk around outdoors in the night in the atmosphere provided by the sounds of rain and approaching thunder.
Or seek refuge inside and fight it out in the saloon...
Charge Guns Blazin' and wreck havoc upon your enemy ;)

**
There are some physic props like bottles (lots!) and some tables and chairs.
the bottles make it that more fun i think, the glass just flies around everywhere when you're trying to hs your foe. (this won't take down your fps on a server)
if you play with  20 bots obviously it will.
**

Multiple accespoints, outside as inside.
it's not a big map, so good for GG.


EDIT*****
Minor changes in updated version :
-fixed textures
-delete several props causing fps drops.
-made it brighter





//i will probably also make a DE or CS map out of this one in the future.
